scripts.serve:watch: node_modules/.bin/stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run serve' .. 'npm run watch' ]
scripts.watch:serve: node_modules/.bin/stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run watch' .. 'npm run serve' ]

scripts.watch:sync: node_modules/.bin/stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run watch' .. 'npm run sync' ]
scripts.sync:watch: node_modules/.bin/stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run sync' .. 'npm run watch' ]

scripts.deploy:live:all: npm run deploy:live && npm run deploy:live:vendor && npm run deploy:live:other

scripts.deploy:preview:all: npm run deploy:preview && npm run deploy:preview:vendor && npm run deploy:preview:other
